description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. In this text-only adventure, you must escape a city ravaged by a mysterious infection. Explore a deserted residence, train station and shopping centre in three unique chapters with multiple endings. Colourblind friendly. A percentage of all sales will be donated to animal conservation charity Save The Rhino.
